verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w Naaman|strong="H5283"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w commander|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Aram, \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w man|strong="H1368"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w master|strong="H8269"\w*’s \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* highly regarded, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w through|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w victory|strong="H8668"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Aram. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w man|strong="H1368"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w valor|strong="H2428"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w leper|strong="H6879"\w*.

\w At|strong="H3478"\w* \w this|strong="H6440"\w* \w time|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Arameans \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w gone|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w bands|strong="H1416"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H7617"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H5291"\w* \w girl|strong="H5291"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w she|strong="H6440"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w serving|strong="H3318"\w* \w Naaman|strong="H5283"\w*’s wife.

\w She|strong="H6440"\w* said \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w her|strong="H6440"\w* \w mistress|strong="H1404"\w*, “If only \w my|strong="H6440"\w* master would go \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w who|strong="H5030"\w* \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \w he|strong="H6440"\w* would cure \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* Naaman \w went|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w his|strong="H5046"\w* master \w what|strong="H2063"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w girl|strong="H5291"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* land \w of|strong="H1696"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*.

“\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w now|strong="H3947"\w*,” said \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Aram, “\w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w letter|strong="H5612"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.” \w So|strong="H3947"\w* Naaman \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*, \w taking|strong="H3947"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w six|strong="H8337"\w* thousand \w shekels|strong="H3701"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w sets|strong="H2487"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* clothing.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w letter|strong="H5612"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w took|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* stated: “\w With|strong="H4428"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w letter|strong="H5612"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* am \w sending|strong="H7971"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Naaman|strong="H5283"\w*, \w so|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w may|strong="H3478"\w* cure \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w read|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w letter|strong="H5612"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w tore|strong="H7167"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* clothes \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w asked|strong="H7971"\w*, “\w Am|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w*, \w killing|strong="H4191"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* giving \w life|strong="H2421"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w man|strong="H4191"\w* expects \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* cure \w a|strong="H3068"\w* leper? \w Surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w can|strong="H7200"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* seeking \w a|strong="H3068"\w* quarrel \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*!”

\w Now|strong="H4994"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* Elisha \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w man|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w torn|strong="H7167"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* clothes, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* message \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w torn|strong="H7167"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* clothes? \w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w man|strong="H3045"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H5975"\w* \w Naaman|strong="H5283"\w* came \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5975"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Elisha’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1980"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H7725"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w*, \w who|strong="H4397"\w* said, “\w Go|strong="H1980"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* yourself \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w will|strong="H1320"\w* \w be|strong="H1320"\w* \w restored|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H1320"\w* \w be|strong="H1320"\w* \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H2009"\w* \w Naaman|strong="H5283"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w away|strong="H3212"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w*, saying, “\w I|strong="H2009"\w* thought \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H3318"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w wave|strong="H5130"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w over|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* spot \w to|strong="H3318"\w* cure \w my|strong="H3068"\w* leprosy.

\w Are|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Abanah \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Pharpar|strong="H6554"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? Could \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w them|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w*?” \w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w away|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w rage|strong="H2534"\w*.

Naaman’s \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w however|strong="H3588"\w*, \w approached|strong="H5066"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w My|strong="H6213"\w* father, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w some|strong="H1697"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*, \w would|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H5030"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*? \w How|strong="H3588"\w* \w much|strong="H1697"\w* \w more|strong="H1419"\w*, \w then|strong="H1696"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w tells|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, ‘\w Wash|strong="H7364"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w*’?”

\w So|strong="H7725"\w* Naaman \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w dipped|strong="H2881"\w* \w himself|strong="H2881"\w* \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*, according \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* God, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w was|strong="H1697"\w* \w restored|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w became|strong="H1697"\w* \w like|strong="H3381"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w little|strong="H6996"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H7725"\w* \w was|strong="H1697"\w* \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* Naaman \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w attendants|strong="H5650"\w* \w went|strong="H3478"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* God, \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w declared|strong="H3045"\w*, “\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w sure|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* God \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth \w except|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w accept|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w gift|strong="H1293"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3947"\w* Elisha replied, “\w As|strong="H3068"\w* surely \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H6440"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*, \w I|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H5975"\w* \w accept|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w*.” \w And|strong="H3068"\w* although Naaman \w urged|strong="H6484"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w accept|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w*.

“\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*,” said \w Naaman|strong="H5283"\w*, “\w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w much|strong="H6213"\w* soil \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pair|strong="H6776"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w mules|strong="H6505"\w* \w can|strong="H5650"\w* \w carry|strong="H6213"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w any|strong="H5750"\w* \w other|strong="H5750"\w* \w god|strong="H3068"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*: \w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* master goes \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Rimmon|strong="H7417"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w leans|strong="H8172"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w arm|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w bow|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Rimmon|strong="H7417"\w*, \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w matter|strong="H1697"\w*.”
“\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*,” said Elisha. But after Naaman had traveled \w a|strong="H3068"\w* short \w distance|strong="H3530"\w*,
